definition: to punch a hole/to drill a hole/to dig a hole/to burrow
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
dozen (loanword)
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Make the bedding deep enough to cover the entire turtle if decides it wants to burrow.
sentences.chinese: 如果箱龟需要打洞，垫材深度需要覆盖整个龟。

sentences.english: Each embroidery is designed step by step.
sentences.chinese: 将描图纸打洞是刺绣设计的前置步骤。

sentences.english: He is a proud tod that will not scrape his own hole.
sentences.chinese: 再高傲的狐狸也得自己打洞。

sentences.english: What can pierce ones ears without a hole?
sentences.chinese: 什么东西不用打洞就可以在耳朵上穿孔？

sentences.english: Big-Bada-Boom – if the Healer burrows, it does massive AOE heal to the whole room.
sentences.chinese: 如果治疗师打洞，会对整个房间造成范围治疗。

sentences.english: Gopher turtles are tortoises that dig burrows in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 沙乌龟是会在地上打洞的旱乌龟。

sentences.english: The punched holes translated to electrical signals.
The forepaws are also used for burrowing and for dragging heavier logs .
sentences.chinese: 它们的前爪还可以用来打洞和拖拽较重的树干。

sentences.english: A hole, new technology, as it were.
sentences.chinese: 而对于打洞，这是一项新技术。

sentences.english: "what the holes used to be on the floor?"the police thought.
sentences.chinese: “这个地板上的打洞是用来做什么的呢？”警察想。

sentences.english: Isn't Moore the guy who punches holes through everything?
sentences.chinese: 摩尔是那个到处打洞的人吧。

sentences.english: A gopher and a mole tunnel up through the floor.
sentences.chinese: 一只地鼠和一只鼹鼠打洞从地板里钻了出来。

to dig a hole
mouse hole
electric drill

tunnel/cave/burrow/dugout
gecko/house lizard
to live in a cave/(of animals) to be of burrowing habit

to dig/to excavate/(coll.) to exclude/not to count/to deduct/to subtract
to dig into/to cut a mine into
termite/white ant
pierce

to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
to climb a wall/(fig.) to be unfaithful
